message: ...I hear a rustling sound. Someone is dragging me along.
A moment later, whoever it is tosses me into the air. I land on something hard.
I open my eyes, assuming Mink tossed me onto the dance floor, but I find myself in an entirely different location altogether.
Where... am I?
My eyelids start to fall again.
A stinging pain against my cheek snaps me awake.
...Glitter?
I thought we were in that club...
When did we get back?
Still groggy, I look around to find Mink staring down at me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Ouch."
When I try to get up, I grimace as a sharp headache hits me. It feels like being stabbed repeatedly with needles.
I'm not surprised that my cheek hurts from the punch, but why does the rest of me feel so sore?
Was that a dream?
Back at the club, Mink and I...
My memory is so foggy that it doesn't seem real...
But the exhaustion and pain tell me that it was.

And on top of it all, I...
...I sure said some wild shit, didn't I...
...Oh no. I don't want to remember.
I'm so embarrassed I could die, but I fight through the pain and sit up.
Timidly, I look at Mink.
Our eyes meet. I start to turn away... but something stops me.
Am I imagining it, or is Mink looking at me differently now?
...Is it wonder in those eyes? Suspicion?
...No. That can't be right.
If anything, he should be looking at me with contempt after what I did.
I stare at the floor in silence. After a moment, Mink turns and goes upstairs without a word.
The sound of his bedroom door closing echoes through the house.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Fuck!"
